name: solidinvoice
tagline: A self-hosted invoicing app for freelancers
description: SolidInvoice is a self-hosted invoicing and billing application for freelancers and small businesses. It supports quotes, recurring invoices, payments, and client management.

features.title: Invoice Creation
features.description: Generates professional invoices with customizable templates

features.title: Quote Management
features.description: Creates quotes that convert to invoices upon acceptance

features.title: Recurring Invoices
features.description: Automates billing for subscriptions and retainer clients

features.title: Payment Tracking
features.description: Records payments and tracks outstanding balances

features.title: Client Management
features.description: Maintains client database with contact and billing information

features.title: Tax Calculations
features.description: Handles multiple tax rates and automatic tax calculations

features.title: Single Sign-On
features.description: Integrates with PayPal, Stripe, and other payment processors

features.title: Expense Tracking
features.description: Records business expenses and attaches to projects
